title: St Luke Novena
description: St Luke the Evangelist wrote one of the four Gospels, along with the Acts of the Apostles. Pray this novena for physicians and surgeons, and to understand Christ‚Äôs words better.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Most charming and saintly Physician, you were animated by the heavenly Spirit of Love. In faithfully describing the humanity of Our Lord Jesus Christ, you also showed His divinity and His genuine compassion for all human beings. Inspire me and those I pray for with your professionalism and with the divine compassion for those we serve. Remember especially my intention in this novena (mention request here‚Ä¶) May the Holy Spirit help me to understand Christ‚Äôs words and faithfully apply them in my life. Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be Saint Luke the Evangelist, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Answered Prayers From This Novena

Answered prayers I prayed to St. Luke (the novena ended today) for my husband to get a job back that had been offered to him but taken away by someone inexplicably and he talked to two wonderful people today who apologized for what happened and the job is his!! Thanks be to God and St. Luke!!!

from K.G.
